fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. If they identify as male, they can't roleblock players tonight. Otherwise, they can't be roleblocked tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You get another TS role in addition to this one because this one sucks balls. You may multitask this role's ability with it.
- Roleblock immune
- Nah, I don't think so, Rasen.
